episode: I have been trying my best to get my project timelines back on track but teammates are not ready to help.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message:
Sure, here’s a quick recap:

1. Hold team meetings to align priorities.
2. Conduct one-on-one chats for better communication.
3. Set clear roles and responsibilities.
4. Engage with team-building activities.
5. Celebrate small wins.
6. Implement rewards and recognition.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: anything to keep team enagaged?

dialogue.speaker: Human
